13810.en:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>Wow <pc>!
We've been waiting for you!<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13810.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>「わあ　<pc>さん！
　お待ちしていましたよ！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13810.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>: 앗, <pc> 씨!
　기다렸어요!<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13810.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>哇，<pc>！
恭候多时了！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13810.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>哇，<pc>！
恭候多時了！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13811.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Looks like it's time to perform the
baptismal rite.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13811.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「どうやら　洗礼の儀を行う時が　来たようだな。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13811.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 보아하니 세례식을 치를 때가 된 것 같군.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13811.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>看来可以举行洗礼仪式了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13811.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>看來可以舉行洗禮儀式了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13812.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>. You have done well.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13812.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<pc>。よくぞ　はげんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13812.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 그동안 애 많이 썼다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13813.en:
Once a priest has been initiated into the Order of Kirika and have developed their strength, they are allowed to be
baptized by the God of Wisdom, Eldona.
13813.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「キリカ修道会に入門し　チカラをつけた僧侶は
　知恵の神　エルドナ神による
　洗礼の儀を　受けることを許されるのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13813.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 키리카 수도회에 입회해 수련을 쌓은
　승려는 지혜의 신인 엘드나 신께
　세례식을 받을 수 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13813.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>加入雾迦修道会，
并拥有足够力量的僧侣，才有资格接受
智慧之神埃尔多纳神的洗礼。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13813.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>加入霧迦修道會，
並擁有足夠力量的僧侶，才有資格接受
智慧之神艾爾多娜神的洗禮。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13814.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>From now on, you are to prepare the
sacraments for the rite of baptism.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13814.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「これより　お前には　洗礼の儀で使う
　聖具を　用意してもらう。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13814.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 지금부터 넌 세례식에 사용할
　성물을 준비해 오도록.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13814.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>现在需要你准备
洗礼仪式所用的圣具。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13814.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>現在需要你準備
洗禮儀式所用的聖具。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13815.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I have given Kokuyou detailed
instructions. Call on him when you
are ready to leave.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13815.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「くわしい指示は　コクヨウに伝えてある。
　出発の準備が　できたら
　彼に　声をかけるといい。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13815.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 자세한 건 코쿠요에게 일러두었으니
　출발할 준비가 되면 코쿠요에게 말해라.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13815.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>具体事项我已经交待给黑曜了。
你做好出发准备后，
就去和他谈谈吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13815.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>具體事項我已經交待給黑曜了。
你做好出發準備後，
就去和他談談吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13816.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Buck up, <pc>.
This is just another trial for you.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13816.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「はげめよ　<pc>。
　これも　お前に与えられる
　ひとつの試練なのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13816.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그럼 열심히 해라, <pc>.
　이것도 네게 주어진 하나의 시련이니까.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13816.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>加油吧，<pc>。
这也是对你的
一个试炼啊。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13816.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>加油吧，<pc>。
這也是對你的
一個考驗啊。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13817.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>There is no doubt about it.
There were definite omens all over
the world.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13817.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「まちがいありません。
　世界各地に　確かな前兆が　現れていました。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13817.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 틀림없습니다.
　세계 각지에서 뚜렷한 전조가 보이고 있어요.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13817.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>不会有错的。
世界各地都出现了确切的前兆。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13817.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>不會有錯的。
世界各地都出現了確切的前兆。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13819.en:
When I heard that the Mirror Fountain had turned downward, I sent you to investigate... but as I thought, the
breath of the Reaper is inevitable, isn't it?
13819.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「みかがみの泉に　かげりが差したと聞き
　あなたに　調べさせましたが……。
　やはり　死神の息吹は　避けられないのですね。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13819.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 거울의 샘이 탁해졌다는 소식을 듣고
　승정님께 조사를 부탁드렸습니다만…….
　역시 사신의 숨결은 피할 수 없나 보군요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13819.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>听闻御镜之泉出现了阴影，
所以叫你去调查了一下……
果然还是无法逃开死神气息呢。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13819.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>聽聞水鏡之泉出現陰影，
所以讓你去調查了一下……
果然還是無法逃開死神吐息呢。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13820.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Will many... die?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13820.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「多くの者が……　死ぬのでしょうか。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13820.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 많은 이들이…… 죽게 될까요?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13820.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>会有很多人……死去吗？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13820.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>會有很多人……死去嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13821.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>I suppose it's just one of those times...
So don't stir up any unrest, and don't
tell anyone about it. Is that clear?<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13821.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「そういう時代も　あるということでしょう……。
　不安を　あおらぬよう　人々には
　このことは　伏せておきなさい。いいですね？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13821.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 이런 시대도 있는 걸 테지요…….
　공연한 불안감을 조장하지 않도록
　이 일은 함구하십시오, 알겠습니까?<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13821.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>那种情况也有可能发生……
为了防止引起大家的不安，这件事情要先保密……
明白了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13821.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>那種情況也有可能發生……
為了防止引起大家的不安，
這件事情要先保密，明白了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13822.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Yes. After the baptism, I'm going out
to investigate.
Maybe we can find something...<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13822.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「ええ。洗礼の儀が済んだら
　私は　調査に出かけます。
　何か手立てが　見つかるかも……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13822.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 예, 전 세례식을 마치고
　다시 조사에 나서겠습니다.
　뭔가 방법을 찾을 수 있을지도 모르니까요…….<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13822.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>嗯。等洗礼仪式结束后，
我会出发去调查的。
或许能找到什么线索……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13822.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>嗯。等洗禮儀式結束後，
我會出發去調查的。
或許能找到什麼線索……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24452.en: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Helga. You are a kind person.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24452.ja: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「ヘルガ。あなたは　やさしい人です。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24452.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 헬가 승정님, 당신은 참으로
　다정한 사람입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24452.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>历雅，你很善良。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24452.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>赫爾嘉，妳很善良。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24453.en:
Because he was the first to notice the signs of the Reaper's breath, he feels as if he has to bear the brunt of this
whole calamity.
24453.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「死神の息吹の前兆に　最初に気づいたがゆえに
　この災いの　すべてを　自分が 
　背負わねばならぬもののように感じている。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24453.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 사신의 숨결의 전조를 가장 먼저
　알아차렸다는 이유로 이 재앙의 모든 책임을
　당신이 져야 한다고 느끼고 있군요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24453.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>你似乎认为，
是你第一个发现死神气息的前兆，
那场灾难就必须全由自己承担。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24453.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>妳似乎認為，
是妳第一個發現死神吐息的前兆，
那場災難就必須全由自己承擔。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13825.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>But you are mistaken. The Reaper's
breath has come into the world
whether you realize it or not.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13825.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「……しかし　それは　まちがいです。 
　あなたが　気づこうと気づくまいと
　死神の息吹は　世に現れたのですから。 <stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13825.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 그건 잘못된 생각입니다.
　승정님이 알아차렸든 아니든
　사신의 숨결은 세상에 나타났을 테니까요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13825.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……但是，你错了。
无论你察觉与否，
死神气息都会出现在世间。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13825.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……但是，妳錯了。
無論妳察覺與否，
死神吐息都已經出現在世間。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13826.en:
Research is all well and good, but you should go home once in a while. You haven't seen Arnoud's face for
a while, have you?
13826.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「調査も　いいですが
　たまには　家に帰りなさい。
　アルノーの顔も　しばらく見ていないのでは？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13826.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 조사도 좋지만 가끔은 집에 돌아가십시오.
　아르노의 얼굴도 한동안 못 보지 않았습니까?<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13826.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>调查是很重要，
但偶尔也要回家看看啊。
你已经很久没有见过步野宇了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13826.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>調查是很重要，
但偶爾也要回家看看啊。
妳已經很久沒有見過阿爾諾了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13827.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「大僧正様…………。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13827.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>大僧正大人……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13827.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>大僧正大人…………<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13828.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Come on in and pray.
I'm sure Eldona will protect you.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13828.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「さあ　中で　祈りましょう。
　きっと　エルドナ神が　お守りくださいますよ。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13828.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 자, 안에서 기도드리죠.
　엘드나 신께서 필시 우리를 지켜주실 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13828.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>好了，我们进去祈祷吧。
埃尔多纳神一定会保佑大家的。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13828.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>好了，我們進去祈禱吧。
艾爾多娜神一定會保佑大家的。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13829.en:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>Oh <pc>.
I've been waiting for you.<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13829.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>。
　待っていましたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13829.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>.
　기다렸습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13829.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>哦，<pc>啊。
等你多时了。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13829.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>啊。
等你很久了。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13830.en:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>Look at this.
Look at this Wood Carved Idol of Eldona.<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13830.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>「ごらんなさい。
　この　木彫りのエルドナ神像を。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13830.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>: 보십시오.
　이 나무로 만든 엘드나 신상을.<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13830.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>请看看这尊
埃尔多纳木雕神像。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13830.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>請看看這尊
木雕的艾爾多娜神像。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13831.en:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>This Wood Carved Idol is a miraculous
statue created by the great priest Kirika
long ago to protect Eltona Continent.<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13831.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>「この木彫りの像は　エルトナ大陸を
　守護するため　はるか昔に　大僧侶キリカが
　お作りになった　奇跡の神像なのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13831.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>: 이 나무 조각상은 먼 옛날
　대승려 키리카가 엘토나 대륙을 지키기 위해
　만든 기적의 신상이랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13831.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>在遥远的过去，大僧侣雾迦
为了守护埃尔托纳大陆，
雕刻了这尊奇迹的雕像。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13831.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>在遙遠的過去，大僧侶霧迦
為了守護艾爾托納大陸，
雕刻了這尊奇蹟的神像。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13832.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Come on, <pc>.
Bonfire Stone here.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13832.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「さあ　<pc>よ。
　かがり火の石を　ここに。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13832.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 자, <pc>.
　화톳불 돌을 제게 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13832.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>来，<pc>，
将篝火之石拿过来。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13832.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>來，<pc>，
將篝火之石拿過來。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13833.en:
<pc> gave
High Priest Iyori the Bonfire Stone.
13833.ja:
<pc>は　イヨリ大僧正に
かがり火の石を　渡した。
13833.zh-Hans:
<pc>把篝火之石
交给了伊典大僧正。
13833.zh-Hant:
<pc>將篝火之石
交給了伊寄大僧正。

13834.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>We are now ready to begin the
baptismal rite. Let's begin the
baptismal rite.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13834.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「これで　準備は　ととのいました。
　洗礼の儀を　始めるといたしましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13834.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 이걸로 준비는 모두 끝났군요.
　그럼 세례식을 시작하죠.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13834.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>这下准备就绪了。
开始洗礼仪式吧。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13834.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>這下準備就緒了。
開始洗禮儀式吧。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13835.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>...Great God Eldona.
Here comes a new hand, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13835.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「……偉大なる　エルドナ神よ。
　ここに　新たなる御手
　<pc>が　参りました。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13835.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: ……위대하신 엘드나 신이시여.
　여기에 당신의 새로운 종
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 왔습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13835.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……伟大的埃尔多纳神啊。
您的新使者——
<pc>在此。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13835.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……偉大的艾爾多娜神啊。
您的新使者──
<pc>在此。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13836.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Please accept this Bonfire Stone.
And bless this one...<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13836.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「この　かがり火の石を
　お受け取りくださいませ。
　そして　この者に　祝福を……。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13836.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 이 화톳불 돌을 받아 주십시오.
　그리고 이자에게 축복을…….<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13836.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>请收下
篝火之石，
并祝福此人吧……<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13836.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>請收下
篝火之石，
並祝福此人吧……<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13838.en:
<center>Oh, I see your face,
you have come to me.
13838.ja:
<center>……おお　お前の顔が見える……
よくぞ　我がもとに　参りました。
13838.ko:
<center>……오오, 그대의 얼굴이 보입니다……
내 곁에 참으로 잘 와 주었습니다.
13838.zh-Hans:
<center>……哦，我能看到你的样子……
欢迎来到我的身边。
13838.zh-Hant:
<center>……喔喔，我能看到你的樣子……
歡迎來到我的身邊。

13839.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc> Can you hear me?
This is the voice of God Eldona...<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13839.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<pc>　聞こえるか？
　これが　エルドナ神の声だ……。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13839.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 들리나?
　이게 바로 엘드나 신의 목소리다…….<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13839.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>，你听到了吗？
这就是埃尔多纳神的声音……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13839.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>，你聽到了嗎？
這就是艾爾多娜神的聲音……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13840.en:
<center>A great evil is coming.
We need your help...
13840.ja:
<center>……大いなる災いが　せまっています。
お前のチカラが　必要なのです……
13840.ko:
<center>……거대한 재앙이 다가오고 있습니다.
그대의 힘이 필요합니다……
13840.zh-Hans:
<center>……大灾难迫近了。
我需要你的力量……
13840.zh-Hant:
<center>……大災難逼近了。
我需要你的力量……

13841.en:
<center><pc>... Save the people...
And when disaster... strikes...
13841.ja:
<center><pc>よ……
人々を　救いなさい……
そして　災いが…おとずれた時には……
13841.zh-Hans:
<center><pc>啊……
去拯救人们吧……
并且在灾难……降临时……
13841.zh-Hant:
<center><pc>啊……
去拯救人們吧……
並且在災難……降臨時……

13843.en: <start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>Looks like it's done...<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13843.ja: <start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>「終わったようですね……。<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13843.ko: <start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>: 끝난 것 같군요…….<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13843.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>结束了呢……<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13843.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>結束了呢……<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13844.en:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>Are you surprised? God Eldona's
Baptism is thus the only time He
gives voice to our new siblings!<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13844.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>「おどろきましたか！？　エルドナ神は
　このようにして　洗礼の儀の時にだけ
　新たな兄弟に　声を聞かせてくださるんです！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13844.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>: 놀라셨습니까!?
　엘드나 신께서는 이렇게 세례식 때만
　새로운 형제에게 목소리를 들려주신답니다!<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13844.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>你被吓到了吗？！埃尔多纳神
就像这样只在洗礼仪式时，
才会对新的同门兄弟说话！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13844.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>你被嚇到了嗎！？艾爾多娜神
就像這樣，只在洗禮儀式時
才會對新的同門兄弟說話！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13845.en:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>But, High Priestess.
What is the great calamity...?<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13845.ja: <start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>「でも　大僧正様。大いなる災いとは……？<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13845.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>: 그런데 대승정님,
　거대한 재앙이란 게 대체 뭔가요……?<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13845.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>不过，大僧正大人，大灾难指的是什么？<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13845.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>不過，大僧正大人，大災難指的是什麼……？<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13846.en:
I will tell you about the plagues when the time comes. But it seems that God wanted the power of ,
and I don't know why...
13846.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「災いのことは　時が来たら　お話ししましょう。
　しかし　神は　<pc>のチカラを
　求めていたようですが　それは　なぜか……。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13846.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 재앙에 관해서는 때가 되면 얘기하겠습니다.
　헌데 신께서는 <pc>의 힘을
　필요로 하셨던 것 같군요. 대체 왜…….<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13846.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>灾难的事情等时机到了我会解释的。
但是，神好像说需要<pc>的力量，
这又是为什么……<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13846.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>災難的事情等時機到了我會解釋的。
但是，神好像說需要<pc>的力量，
這又是為什麼……<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13847.en:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>It must be a divine service. A
word of congratulations and best wishes
to <pc> for their initiation.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13847.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>「きっと　神の　サービスというものでしょう。
　<pc>の　入門を祝い
　はげんでもらうための　言葉ですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13847.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>: 엘드나 신의 서비스 같은 거 아닐까요?
　<pc>의 입회를 축하할 겸
　격려 차원에서 하신 말씀이겠죠.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13847.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>肯定是神的恩惠吧。
为了祝贺<pc>的加入，
并给予激励，才那么说的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13847.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>肯定是神的恩惠吧。
為了祝賀<pc>的加入，
並給予激勵才那麼說的。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13848.en: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Hmmm... I see.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13848.ja: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「ふむう……。なるほど。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13848.ko: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 흐음……. 그렇군요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13848.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>唔……这样啊。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13848.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>嗯……這樣啊。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13849.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>. Thank you for your efforts.
In honor of this day, here's a little
something from us.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13849.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<pc>。ご苦労だったな。
　この日を祝って　私たちからの　贈り物だ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13849.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 수고 많았다.
　오늘을 위해 우리가 준비한 축하 선물이다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13849.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>，辛苦了。
为庆祝今天，我们有礼物送给你。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13849.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>，辛苦了。
為慶祝今天，我們有禮物送給你。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

13850.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>...must have been quite a challenge
to receive the Bonfire Stone.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13850.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……かがり火の石を　手に入れるのは
　なかなか　手を焼いただろう。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13850.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……화톳불 돌을 구하느라
　상당히 애먹었을 테지?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13850.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……为了获得篝火之石
你一定费了不少力气吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13850.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……為了獲得篝火之石，
你一定費了不少力氣吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13851.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Actually, I didn't tell you this, but
Bonfire Stones can be easily
obtained by defeating the <%sEV_QUE_NAME1>.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13851.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「じつは　お前には　教えなかったが
　かがり火の石は　<%sEV_QUE_NAME1>を
　倒すことでも　簡単に　手に入るのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13851.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 네게는 알려주지 않았다만
　사실 화톳불 돌은 {%sEV_QUE_NAME1}|hpp(을,를)
　쓰러뜨리면 손쉽게 얻을 수 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13851.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>其实我一直没告诉你，
只要去打倒<%sEV_QUE_NAME1>
就能轻易获得篝火之石。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13851.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>其實我一直沒告訴你，
只要打倒<%sEV_QUE_NAME1>
就能輕易獲得篝火之石。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13852.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>But I dared to tell you about the
stronger one, <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>. It's my
way of being tough on my pupils.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13852.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「だが　お前には　あえて　強い方の
　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>と　教えたのだ。
　弟子に　厳しいのが　私のやり方でな。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13852.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 하지만 네게는 일부러 더 강한
　{%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(을,를) 쓰러뜨리라고 가르쳤지.
　제자는 강하게 키우는 게 내 방침이거든.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13852.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>但是，我却特意告诉你更加厉害的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。
我的作风就是要严格要求弟子。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13852.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>但是，我卻特意告訴你
更加厲害的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。
我的作風就是要嚴格要求弟子。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13853.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>This is also to strengthen you.
Be strong <pc>. We will need the
strength of people like you.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13853.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「これも　お前をきたえるため。
　強くなれ　<pc>。
　お前のような者のチカラが　いずれ必要となる。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13853.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 이것도 다 널 단련시키기 위해서다.
　힘을 길러라, <pc>.
　언젠가 너와 같은 자의 힘이 필요해질 테니.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13853.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>这也是为了锻炼你。
变强吧，<pc>。
总有一天，你的力量将会必不可少。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13853.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>這也是為了鍛鍊你。
變強吧，<pc>。
總有一天會需要用上你的力量。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
